org.educraft.block

Class EduCraftGuiHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.educraft.block.EduCraftGuiHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    cpw.mods.fml.common.network.IGuiHandler

    public class EduCraftGuiHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements cpw.mods.fml.common.network.IGuiHandler
    This class handles the display of all custom-made GUIs.

      • getServerGuiElement

        public java.lang.Object getServerGuiElement(int id,
                                   net.minecraft.entity.player.EntityPlayer player,
                                   net.minecraft.world.World world,
                                   int x,
                                   int y,
                                   int z)
        Generates a container, which forms the server side of the GUI.
        Specified by:
        getServerGuiElement in interface cpw.mods.fml.common.network.IGuiHandler
        Parameters:
        id - number to indicate which GUI we want to open
        player - the player who is opening the GUI
        world - the world the player is in
        x - the x-position of the player
        y - the y-position of the player
        z - the z-position of the player
        Returns:
        A GuiScreen/Container to be displayed to the user, null if none.
